channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for FL

item.title: Report X-2023070133
item.description:
Report X-2023070133

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-28T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-28
  • City: ORLANDO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was found wet in the load area and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: 1 of the jugs in the box of Rapicide Part A was leaking contents from under the cap, even though the cap was on tight. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023061733
item.description:
Report X-2023061733

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-27
  • City: JACKSONVILLE
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet box was found during unload from trailer on preload shift. Box was placed in a plastic bag and brought to cage for inspection. DescribePack: Loose caps on top of bottles DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: After inspection box and contents were placed in a hazmat bag and salvage drum.

item.title: Report X-2023061712
item.description:
Report X-2023061712

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-27
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet. Upon inspection found 4 bottles of Zep calcium, lime & rust stain remover 1-gallon had small dents on sides & loose lids which resulted to leakage & stained contents. DescribePack: Bottles had small dents on sides & loose lids which resulted to leakage & stained contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023061701
item.description:
Report X-2023061701

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-26
  • City: PALMETTO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found to be damaged while being unloaded from the origin truck. The package was removed from the rest and placed in a drum in the hazmat cage. DescribePack: There is a small hole in the side of the bottle that looks to have occurred when the box got the hole in the side. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was immediately separated and placed in the drum and put in the hazmat cage

item.title: Report X-2023070153
item.description:
Report X-2023070153

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-29T00:34:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-04-13
  • City: JACKSONVILLE
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered to be leaking during unload. During hazmat inspection it was found that the caps on the bottles inside the package were not secure, causing bottles to leak through packaging. DescribePack: Caps loose on bottles inside of fiberboard box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Caps were secured and hazmat was placed into a hazmat bag to keep from leaking further.
